article_title: Trump wins in Dillon County, but Cruz makes it close
article_text:

og.description: DILLON, S.C. – In Saturday’s Republican primary, Dillon voters agreed with the state in selecting Donald Trump as the nominee, but the race was close.
og.title: Trump wins in Dillon County, but Cruz makes it close
